UniprotID	Q9BYG0
Accession	Q9BYG0;D3DNS5;Q59FE3;Q7L9Z5;Q8WWP9
EntryName	B3GN5_HUMAN
ProteinName	Lactosylceramide 1,3-N-acetyl-beta-D-glucosaminyltransferase (EC 2.4.1.206) (Lactotriaosylceramide synthase) (Lc(3)Cer synthase) (Lc3 synthase) (UDP-GlcNAc:beta-Gal beta-1,3-N-acetylglucosaminyltransferase 5) (BGnT-5) (Beta-1,3-Gn-T5) (Beta-1,3-N-acetylglucosaminyltransferase 5) (Beta3Gn-T5)
GeneName	B3GNT5
Length	378
Function	Beta-1,3-N-acetylglucosaminyltransferase that plays a key role in the synthesis of lacto- or neolacto-series carbohydrate chains on glycolipids, notably by participating in biosynthesis of HNK-1 and Lewis X carbohydrate structures. Has strong activity toward lactosylceramide (LacCer) and neolactotetraosylceramide (nLc(4)Cer; paragloboside), resulting in the synthesis of Lc(3)Cer and neolactopentaosylceramide (nLc(5)Cer), respectively. Probably plays a central role in regulating neolacto-series glycolipid synthesis during embryonic development.
Subcellular Location	Golgi apparatus membrane
Disorder	0.0929,0.1323,0.0483,0.0749,0.0454,0.0287,0.0198,0.0281,0.0205,0.0134,0.0143,0.0198,0.0133,0.0099,0.0101,0.0119,0.0119,0.0085,0.0071,0.0048,0.0042,0.0029,0.0030,0.0046,0.0035,0.0045,0.0062,0.0083,0.0060,0.0064,0.0094,0.0107,0.0089,0.0119,0.0218,0.0218,0.0258,0.0157,0.0258,0.0205,0.0248,0.0306,0.0749,0.0690,0.0327,0.0618,0.0287,0.0181,0.0202,0.0364,0.0581,0.0334,0.0334,0.0253,0.0253,0.0248,0.0463,0.0454,0.0690,0.0676,0.1399,0.2094,0.2064,0.2034,0.1298,0.1298,0.0719,0.1528,0.2064,0.1942,0.2002,0.1969,0.2064,0.2193,0.2752,0.2817,0.2951,0.2193,0.1449,0.1048,0.0605,0.0287,0.0151,0.0171,0.0163,0.0275,0.0389,0.0835,0.0835,0.0948,0.0506,0.0483,0.0483,0.0799,0.0719,0.0888,0.0463,0.0443,0.0690,0.1206,0.0985,0.1611,0.2609,0.3983,0.4831,0.3872,0.3117,0.3460,0.3117,0.3087,0.2034,0.3149,0.2715,0.2884,0.1969,0.2002,0.2064,0.2094,0.1184,0.0985,0.0568,0.1206,0.1251,0.1349,0.1323,0.1424,0.1501,0.2224,0.2258,0.2470,0.2503,0.2575,0.2541,0.2884,0.2715,0.2752,0.2436,0.1349,0.2224,0.3494,0.3910,0.4831,0.3910,0.4017,0.3840,0.2849,0.1731,0.2680,0.2645,0.2783,0.1583,0.1007,0.1731,0.1611,0.0870,0.0494,0.0948,0.0676,0.1424,0.0780,0.0704,0.0380,0.0227,0.0281,0.0269,0.0138,0.0214,0.0188,0.0148,0.0151,0.0146,0.0165,0.0160,0.0174,0.0171,0.0258,0.0443,0.0198,0.0198,0.0146,0.0240,0.0202,0.0364,0.0690,0.1028,0.0555,0.0555,0.0327,0.0631,0.0555,0.0605,0.0646,0.0631,0.0568,0.0531,0.0306,0.0218,0.0240,0.0494,0.0483,0.0780,0.0835,0.0581,0.0531,0.0313,0.0306,0.0592,0.0581,0.0506,0.0294,0.0405,0.0341,0.0209,0.0341,0.0605,0.0531,0.0780,0.1501,0.1643,0.1028,0.1671,0.1643,0.1501,0.2258,0.2224,0.2884,0.1823,0.1007,0.1349,0.2258,0.2193,0.2399,0.1881,0.1643,0.1823,0.1007,0.1162,0.1184,0.0555,0.0555,0.1028,0.0555,0.0506,0.0414,0.0414,0.0334,0.0275,0.0269,0.0320,0.0275,0.0275,0.0494,0.0473,0.0424,0.0618,0.0443,0.0870,0.0473,0.0306,0.0646,0.0424,0.0380,0.0765,0.0765,0.0543,0.0592,0.0719,0.0870,0.0929,0.0765,0.0765,0.0851,0.0948,0.0568,0.0405,0.0364,0.0454,0.0258,0.0231,0.0341,0.0320,0.0398,0.0235,0.0218,0.0
